tool.name: DnaAverages
tool.description: : Load .ser file for a given helical parameter and read each column corresponding to a base calculating average over each one.

param.name: input_ser_path
param.label: input SER file
param.help: Path to .ser file for helical parameter. File is expected to be a table, with the first column being an index and the rest the helical parameter values for each base/basepair. Format: [input].ser

param.name: outname_output_csv_path
param.label: output CSV name
param.help: Path to .csv file where output is saved Format: [output].csv

param.name: outname_output_jpg_path
param.label: output JPG name
param.help: Path to .jpg file where output is saved Format: [output].jpg

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

inputs.section:
<param name="sequence" type="text" label="sequence" help="Nucleic acid sequence corresponding to the input .ser file. Length of sequence is expected to be the same as the total number of columns in the .ser file, minus the index column (even if later on a subset of columns is selected with the *seqpos* option)." optional="true"
/>
<param name="helpar_name" type="text" label="helpar_name" help="helical parameter name." optional="false" value="Optional"
/>
